ovdesc.p: Used to record the dates positions were sucessfully reconciled. A record will exist for each depository, sub-account and security code combination. The reconciliation method will also be recorded.

desc.p: Extracted from the key of the SR.SECURITY.RECON record. This field displays the sub account.
Extracted from the key of the SR.SECURITY.RECON record. This field displays the id and enrichment from the SECURITY.MASTER file for the records that are depository.
This field displays the statement date when the position was last reconciled successfully.
Extracted from the key of the SR.SECURITY.RECON record. This field displays the id and enrichment from the CUSTOMER.SECURITY file for the records that are depository.
Record id, up to 40 alpha numeric characters.
This field displays the reconciliation method when the position was last reconciled successfully.
Will either be AUTOMATIC, if all items were reconciled by the automatic matching process, or MANUAL, if the reconciliation was completed manually.
